product_name: Bison Designs Cylinder Whistle Keychain - Small
long_description: The tiny Bison Designs Cylinder Whistle keychain is smaller than your keys, but its shrill note is sure to attract attention. Whistle is made from colorful anodized aluminum and measures 2 in. in length. Attached to a 1 in. split ring. Comes in assorted colors only; sorry, specific color requests cannot be accommodated.
short_description: The tiny Bison Designs Cylinder Whistle keychain is smaller than your keys, but its shrill note is sure to attract attention.
